page.title: 14A Day in my Life-Girl aged10
page.content: I get up at 7.30a.m.,get ready for school and go downstairs to have my breakfast.For breakfast I have some cereal and a cup of tea.Then I pack my bag with my reading book and lunch box.First it is Assembly.In Assembly we have a song,a story and a prayer. Then we do Maths,English or unfinished work.On Friday it is Swimming.At 10.45a.m. it is playtime,I play tennis with my friend.After play we do S.M.P. Maths.On Monday we sing.At 12.00p.m. it is dinnertime.People have cooked or packed lunches.We come in at 1.00p.m. and do Writing,Maths or Projectwork.On Monday,Tuesday and Friday we have French.On Thursday we do Art&Craft all afternoon.We have a last play at 2.30p.m.School ends at 3.20p.m.When I get home I watch television or play with my friends.I go to bed at 8.30p.m.
